hanzi-su-wiki:
機

Значения

Ткацкий станок; машина, механизм; удобный момент

Мнемоника

  • Деревянный 木 ткацкий станок, требующий большого внимания — сколько 幾 взято ниток каждого цвета.

  • "Мы использовали 木 деревянный ткацкий станок, чтобы соткать ткань из нитей 糸."

Варианты

机

heisig_chinese_memo: An abacus is a machine made of wood used to calculate how many 'anythings'.
heisig_constituent: mechanism, tree, wood, abacus, how many, cocoon, person, fiesta, cocoon2
koohiiStory1: An abacus is a mechanism made of wood used to calculate how many ´anythings´.
koohiiStory2: To avoid confusing with contraption (#677), focus on the "ism" of mechanism. For example, fetishism refers to having a fetish; mechanism here refers to having a mecha-like property, where mecha is a type of anime robot that can transform itself. Imagine a mecha that can transform itself between two forms: a huge immovable tree (as a form of defense) and a gigantic marching abacus that smashes enemies between its giant beads.

WaniKani_Radicals: 木, 幺, 戈, 人
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A drunkard is the kind of person who would poop two times under a tree before using a machine toilet. There’s a perfectly good outhouse with a machine toilet right there, but this drunkard is so drunk that he decides to poop under the tree instead. And not only does he poop once, he poops twice.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine this drunkard, squatting down under the tree to poop. You can smell the poop and a faint stench of alcohol in the air. How could he not have realized that there was a portable machine toilet right there?
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Oh, I see – the door to the outhouse with the machine toilet is locked, and the drunkard doesn’t have the key (き). If he had a machine like a jackhammer, or a circular saw, or some other heavy duty machine, he might be able to get in without a key, but since he has none of those or a key, he’s reduced to pooping under the tree instead.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Listen to the drunkard grumbling about the lack of a key as he poops under the tree. He doesn’t sound happy, and every time he stresses to push out the poop, his voice fluctuates. Imagine hearing this in your mind and being a wee bit disgusted.
Ru_Meaning: loom, mechanism, machine, airplane, opportunity, potency, efficacy, occasion
Ru_Radicals: 丶 (капля), ノ, 幺 (короткая нить), 戈 (копьё), 木 (дерево)

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: One of the greatest machines invented is a wooden desk.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " wood " to " ji " sound. The original meaning is a crossbow machine, that is, an arrow-raising device installed on a crossbow in ancient times. "Shuowen": "The machine, the main thing is the machine. From the wood, a few sounds." Such as "Shang Shu. "Taijia First": "If you have a machine, go to the province and enclose it in the degree, then release." Kong Chuan: "Yu, the degree is also. The machine, the degree of opportunity is based on the quasi-see. Zezhong." "Lu Shi Chunqiu. "Zhawei": "A husband's crossbow will not send out if it is less than a meter."

" Machine " later referred to braking devices in general, and also to equipment equipped with such devices. Duan Yucai "Annotation to Shuo Wen Jie Zi. Mube: "The machine, the machine is mainly used for hair, so whoever takes the lead is called the machine." Such as "Warring States Policy. "Song Wei Ce": "As for public defeat, Chu set up an opportunity to attack the Song." Yao Hong's note: "Machine, weapon, belonging to the ladder." "Historical Records. "The Book of the First Emperor of Qin": "Using mercury for the rivers and oceans of the rivers and oceans, instilled by mechanics, with astronomy above and geography below."

" Machine " also specifically refers to a loom. "Ji Yun. Wei Yun: "Machine, weaving tools." Such as "Historical Records. "The Biography of Li Sheng and Lu Jia Lie": "Besides the two heroes do not stand together, Chu and Han are at odds with each other for a long time, the people are in turmoil, the country is shaking, the farmers release Lei, the worker women get off the plane, the heart of the world has not yet been determined." . Mother Yi Biography. "Zou Mengke Mu": "If a child fails to learn, he will show Yan when he breaks his machine. Then he becomes a virtue and is the crown of the world."

" Machine " represents the key to things. Such as "Pipe. "Quan Xiu": "Han Feizi." "Han Feizi. "Eight Talks": "Leaving people to do things, there is also an opportunity to survive and cure chaos."

" Machine " means confidential. "Words. Mube: "Mechanism, secret." Such as "Six Secret Teachings." Wen Tao. "Bing Dao": "One in one separation, one gathering and the other dispersing, conspiracy, secret the opportunity; Gao Qili, Fu Qirui." Song Luyou, "Drunk in cursive script made this poem because of play": "The child asks Weng Xinwu Chu , He wants to speak out and fear to vent the secret."

" Machine " indicates timing. "Guang Yun. "Wei Yun": "Opportunity, meeting also." Such as "Huainanzi. "Strategic Strategy": "Therefore, the general's use of troops is to go up to heaven, to gain ground, and to win the hearts of the people. It is to act with opportunity and use force to defeat the army without breaking the army." "Historical Records. "Xiang Yu Benji": "Chu soldiers stop eating, and when Chu is dead this day, it is better to take it because of its opportunity."

" Machine " means talent and quality. Such as "Zhuangzi. Grand Master": "Those whose senile desires are deep, their secrets are shallow." "The Family Instructions of Yan Family. "Mianxue": "As far as the crown marriage, the physical nature is a little fixed; therefore, the secret of the heavens requires more training."

" Machine " means ingenious and clever. Such as "Zhuangzi. "Heaven and Earth": "I have heard of my teacher. If there is a machine, there must be an organic matter, and an organic matter must have an organic heart." Cheng Xuanyingshu: "Anyone who has mobile affairs must have an organic heart to change." "Lie Zi. "Zhong Ni": "Does the doctor ask Qilu how many opportunities?" Zhang Zhan's note: "A chance, a cleverness. How many clever people are."

" Machine " means business. Such as "Han Shu. "The Biography of Huo Guangjin Rixie": "(Huo) Guang has upheld everything from the Houyuan to the throne, and he returns to politics." "Three Kingdoms. Wei Shu. The Biography of Ren Su Du Zheng Cang: "Your Majesty is worried about everything, or is close to the lights, but the general affairs are unhealthy, and the punishment is relaxed. Isn't it the obvious effect of the uncalled for?"

" Machine " is commonly used as " ji ", which can express subtlety. Such as "Zhou Yi. "Xi Ci": "The Husband's "Yi", the reason why the saint is so deep is to study the mechanism." Zheng Xuan's note: "The opportunity, as a few." It also expressed danger. Such as "Huainanzi. Yuan Dao": "Stay high but not opportunistic, holding profit but not falling." Gao Luu's note: "Opportunity, danger; overturning, overturning."
humanum_short_description_en: From " wood " to " ji " sound. The original meaning is a crossbow machine, that is, an ancient arrow-raising device installed on a crossbow, and later refers to a braking device, and also refers to a device equipped with this device.
humanum_full_description:
從「木」，「幾」聲。本義是弩機，即古代裝在弩上的發箭裝置。《說文》：「機，主發謂之機。从木，幾聲。」如《尚書．太甲上》：「若虞機張，往省括于度，則釋。」孔傳：「虞，度也。度機，機有度以準望。如射先省矢括于度，釋則中。」《呂氏春秋．察微》：「夫弩機差以米則不發。」

　　「機」後來泛指制動裝置，亦指設有這種裝置的器械。段玉裁《說文解字注．木部》：「機，機之用主於發，故凡主發者皆謂之機。」如《戰國策．宋衛策》：「公輸般為楚設機，將以攻宋。」姚宏注：「機，械，雲梯之屬。」《史記．秦始皇本紀》：「以水銀為百川江河大海，機相灌輸，上具天文，下具地理。」

　　「機」也特指織布機。《集韻．微韻》：「機，織具也。」如《史記．酈生陸賈列傳》：「且兩雄不俱立，楚漢久相持不決，百姓騷動，海內搖蕩，農夫釋耒，工女下機，天下之心未有所定也。」《列女傳．母儀傳．鄒孟軻母》：「子學不進，斷機示焉。子遂成德，為當世冠。」

　　「機」表示事物的關鍵。如《管子．權脩》：「故曰，察能授官，班祿賜予，使民之機也。」 《韓非子．八說》：「任人以事，存亡治亂之機也。」

　　「機」表示機密。《字彙．木部》：「機，密也。」如《六韜．文韜．兵道》：「一合一離，一聚一散，陰其謀，密其機；高其壘，伏其銳。」宋陸游〈醉中草書因戲作此詩〉：「稚子問翁新悟處，欲言直恐泄天機。」

　　「機」表示時機。《廣韻．微韻》：「機，會也。」如《淮南子．兵略》：「故上將之用兵也，上得天道，下得地利，中得人心，乃行之以機，發之以勢，是以無破軍敗兵。」《史記．項羽本紀》：「楚兵罷食盡，此天亡楚之時也，不如因其機而遂取之。」

　　「機」表示天賦、素質。如《莊子．大宗師》：「其耆欲深者，其天機淺。」《顏氏家訓．勉學》：「及至冠婚，體性稍定；因此天機，倍須訓誘。」

　　「機」表示機巧、機靈。如如《莊子．天地》：「吾聞之吾師，有機械者必有機事，有機事者必有機心。」成玄英疏：「有機動之務者，必有機變之心。」《列子．仲尼》：「大夫不問齊魯之多機乎？」張湛注：「機，巧也。多巧能之人。」

　　「機」表示事務。如《漢書．霍光金日磾傳》：「（霍）光自後元秉持萬機，及上即位，乃歸政。」《三國志．魏書．任蘇杜鄭倉傳》：「陛下憂勞萬機，或親燈火，而庶事不康，刑禁日弛，豈非股肱不稱之明效歟？」

　　「機」通作「幾」，可表示細微。如《周易．繫辭上》：「夫《易》，聖人之所以極深而研機也。」鄭玄注：「機，當作幾。」又表示危。如《淮南子．原道》：「處高而不機，持盈而不傾。」高誘注：「機，危也；傾，覆也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「木」，「幾」聲。本義是弩機，即古代裝在弩上的發箭裝置，後泛指制動裝置，亦指設有這種裝置的器械。

Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: A table 幾 made of wood 木; 幾 also provides the pronunciation
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 幾 [ jǐ ] small table; how many; a few, some
①事物發生的樞紐：生機。危機。轉(zhu僴)機。契機。
②對事情成敗有重要關係的中心環節，有保密性質的事件：軍機。機密。
③合宜的時候：機會。機遇。時機。
④由許多零作組成可以做功或有特殊作用的裝置和設備：機器。機動。機關。
⑤有生命的生物體器官的作用：機能。有機體。
⑥靈活，能迅速適應事物變化的：機智。機敏。機巧。機變。
⑦指“飛機”：客機。機場。機組。

從「 木 」，「 幾 」聲。本義是弩機，即古代裝在弩上的發箭裝置。《說文》：「機，主發謂之機。从木，幾聲。」如《尚書．太甲上》：「若虞機張，往省括于度，則釋。」孔傳：「虞，度也。度機，機有度以準望。如射先省矢括于度，釋則中。」《呂氏春秋．察微》：「夫弩機差以米則不發。」 「 機 」後來泛指制動裝置，亦指設有這種裝置的器械。段玉裁《說文解字注．木部》：「機，機之用主於發，故凡主發者皆謂之機。」如《戰國策．宋衛策》：「公輸般為楚設機，將以攻宋。」姚宏注：「機，械，雲梯之屬。」《史記．秦始皇本紀》：「以水銀為百川江河大海，機相灌輸，上具天文，下具地理。」 「 機 」也特指織布機。《集韻．微韻》：「機，織具也。」如《史記．酈生陸賈列傳》：「且兩雄不俱立，楚漢久相持不決，百姓騷動，海內搖蕩，農夫釋耒，工女下機，天下之心未有所定也。」《列女傳．母儀傳．鄒孟軻母》：「子學不進，斷機示焉。子遂成德，為當世冠。」 「 機 」表示事物的關鍵。如《管子．權脩》：「故曰，察能授官，班祿賜予，使民之機也。」 《韓非子．八說》：「任人以事，存亡治亂之機也。」 「 機 」表示機密。《字彙．木部》：「機，密也。」如《六韜．文韜．兵道》：「一合一離，一聚一散，陰其謀，密其機；高其壘，伏其銳。」宋陸游〈醉中草書因戲作此詩〉：「稚子問翁新悟處，欲言直恐泄天機。」 「 機 」表示時機。《廣韻．微韻》：「機，會也。」如《淮南子．兵略》：「故上將之用兵也，上得天道，下得地利，中得人心，乃行之以機，發之以勢，是以無破軍敗兵。」《史記．項羽本紀》：「楚兵罷食盡，此天亡楚之時也，不如因其機而遂取之。」 「 機 」表示天賦、素質。如《莊子．大宗師》：「其耆欲深者，其天機淺。」《顏氏家訓．勉學》：「及至冠婚，體性稍定；因此天機，倍須訓誘。」 「 機 」表示機巧、機靈。如如《莊子．天地》：「吾聞之吾師，有機械者必有機事，有機事者必有機心。」成玄英疏：「有機動之務者，必有機變之心。」《列子．仲尼》：「大夫不問齊魯之多機乎？」張湛注：「機，巧也。多巧能之人。」 「 機 」表示事務。如《漢書．霍光金日磾傳》：「（霍）光自後元秉持萬機，及上即位，乃歸政。」《三國志．魏書．任蘇杜鄭倉傳》：「陛下憂勞萬機，或親燈火，而庶事不康，刑禁日弛，豈非股肱不稱之明效歟？」 「 機 」通作「 幾 」，可表示細微。如《周易．繫辭上》：「夫《易》，聖人之所以極深而研機也。」鄭玄注：「機，當作幾。」又表示危。如《淮南子．原道》：「處高而不機，持盈而不傾。」高誘注：「機，危也；傾，覆也。」

機字的基本解释

機
jī
见“机”。

機字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jī］
［《廣韻》居依切，平微，見。］
(1)古代弩上发箭的装置。
(2)指机械，器械。今作机器的通称。如拖拉机、切割机等。
(3)捕鸟兽的机关。
(4)指织机。
(5)古代抬尸的用具。
(6)事物的关键；枢纽。
(7)机密，机要。多指军国大事。
(8)事物变化之所由。
(9)先兆，征兆。
(10)时机，机会。
(11)机巧。
(12)秉赋，性灵。
(13)计策，计谋。
(14)心意。
(15)灵感，灵机。
(16)指股骨和髋骨相结合处，相当于环跳穴的部位。
(17)门限。
(18)比喻迅疾。
(19)指飞机。
(20)生活机能。
(21)星名。北斗七星中的第三星，又称玑或天玑。参见“機衡”。
(22)通“幾”。危险，危殆。
(23)通“異”。殊异。参见“機服”。

機字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　機； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页554第08
【唐韻】【韻會】居衣切【集韻】居希切，?音幾。【說文】主發謂之機。【書·太甲】若虞機張，往省括于度則釋。【尚書·大傳】捕獸機檻陷。【大學】其機如此。【註】發動所由。【疏】關機也。動於近，成於遠。　又星名。【博雅】斗星三爲機。【通卦驗】遂皇始出，握機矩，法北斗七星，而立七政。　又【集韻】織具謂之機杼，機以轉軸，杼以持緯。　又氣運之變化曰機。【莊子·天運篇】意者有機，緘而不得已耶。【至樂篇】萬物皆出於機，皆入於機。　又機械，巧術也。【莊子·天地篇】有機械者，必有機事。有機事者，必有機心。　又天機，天眞也。【莊子·大宗師篇】嗜慾深者天機淺。　又【韻會】要也，會也，密也。【書·臯陶謨】一日二日萬幾。【疏】作機。　又木名。【山海經】單狐之山多機木。【郭註】機，去聲。　【正韻】作堅溪切，音雞，非。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jī］
["Guangyun" Ju Yiqie, Ping Wei, see. ]
(1) A device for sending arrows on ancient crossbows.
(2) Refers to machinery and equipment. This is a generic term for machines. Such as tractors, cutting machines, etc.
(3) Institutions for catching birds and beasts.
(4) Refers to the loom.
(5) The equipment used to lift the corpse in ancient times.
(6) The key to things; the hub.
(7) Confidential and confidential. Refers to military affairs.
(8) The reason why things change.
(9) Signs, signs.
(10) Timing, opportunity.
(11) Ingenuity.
(12) Endowment, spirituality.
(13) Strategies, tactics.
(14) Mind.
(15) Inspiration, cleverness.
(16) Refers to the joint of the femur and hip bone, which is equivalent to the part of the Huantiao point.
(17) Threshold.
(18) The metaphor is fast.
(19) Refers to aircraft.
(20) Life function.
(21) Star name. The three stars of the Big Dipper, also known as Ji or Tianji. See "machine scale".
(22) Through "ji". Dangerous, dangerous.
(23) Through "different". Different. See "machine service".

Name meaning

jī
вм. 机

機

Значения

Ткацкий станок; машина, механизм; удобный момент

Мнемоника

  • Деревянный 木 ткацкий станок, требующий большого внимания — сколько 幾 взято ниток каждого цвета.

  • "Мы использовали 木 деревянный ткацкий станок, чтобы соткать ткань из нитей 糸."

Варианты

机

Radicals: 木, 幺, 戈, 人  (tree, poop, drunkard, person)
Meaning Mnemonic
A drunkard is the kind of person who would poop two times under a tree before using a machine toilet. There’s a perfectly good outhouse with a machine toilet right there, but this drunkard is so drunk that he decides to poop under the tree instead. And not only does he poop once, he poops twice.
Imagine this drunkard, squatting down under the tree to poop. You can smell the poop and a faint stench of alcohol in the air. How could he not have realized that there was a portable machine toilet right there?
Reading Mnemonic
Oh, I see – the door to the outhouse with the machine toilet is locked, and the drunkard doesn’t have the key (き). If he had a machine like a jackhammer, or a circular saw, or some other heavy duty machine, he might be able to get in without a key, but since he has none of those or a key, he’s reduced to pooping under the tree instead.
Listen to the drunkard grumbling about the lack of a key as he poops under the tree. He doesn’t sound happy, and every time he stresses to push out the poop, his voice fluctuates. Imagine hearing this in your mind and being a wee bit disgusted.
